details.description: Get advice on how you can avoid cash-flow problems for your business and how to improve your finances - cash flow forecasting, business growth
details.alternative_title: Avoid late payments for your business
details.video_summary: Get advice on how you can avoid cash flow problems for your business and how to improve your finances.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Different kinds of business finance, including shares, loans, grants, overdrafts, invoice financing and leasing
Search for publicly-backed finance or support schemes based on basic information about your business including location and type
